Welcome To ForWEB

An initiative of the Department of Meteorology and Climate Science Programme,KNUST, mandated to prepare, disseminate and evaluate daily weather forecasts over the Ashanti Region, along with High-Impact Weather (HiW) risk indicators for the entire country.

We are mandated to prepare, disseminate and evaluate daily weather forecasts over the Ashanti Region, along with High-Impact Weather (HiW) risk indicators for the entire country.

Who We Are

Forecasters' Web (ForWEB) KNUST is an initiative of the Department of Meteorology and Climate Science, KNUST. ForWEB KNUST is mandated to prepare, disseminate and evaluate daily weather forecasts over the Ashanti Region, along with High-Impact Weather (HiW) risk indicators for the entire country.

GCRF African SWIFT Project (legacy) - Satellite Dish and accessories (NWCSAF) for research on Nowcasting and its operational use.

What We Do

Forecast Generation & Dissemination
Schools’ and Community Outreach to Create Awareness on Climate Change and Climate Science. (SDG 13 - Climate Action)
Organizing Climate Webinars, Conference and Workshops.
